title: Will people of Paradise intercede for those in hell? What about an Hafiz al Quran? Assim al hakeem
transcript: the u.s he says is it true that the people of paradise will intercede to some of those who are in hell fire of the muslims the answer is yes that there are different types of intercession on the day of judgment among them is the people of heavens of paradise will intercede for some of their brethrens who are still in hell that allah would take them out and admit them to paradise and would have the quran intercede to his wife kids and relatives the hadith in this is not authentic but we wish in allah's generosity
